short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Play your lecture videos smoothly with various options

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The app enables you to control your video playback using keyboard shortcuts

Following controls to control your video (The page must contain one video for it work correctly until now)

k = play/pause
l = Faster
j = slower 
i = -10 s
o = +10s

+/- = volume
m = mute
